content: This first part of the plot is a good introduction for the amnesiacs and sets up the premise of their amnesia and the conflict between them. It also establishes their inner demons and feral state, which adds to their character development. To refine this first part, you could consider adding more detail to the environment and setting to help the reader better visualize the world. Additionally, you could provide more context and hints about their past and the source of their amnesia, to build intrigue and keep the reader engaged. It could also be useful to develop the characters' motivations and personalities further, so that their actions and reactions are more relatable and understandable. Finally, consider adding more tension and suspense to the scene where Yukiko and Takeshi first meet, as this is a critical moment in the plot and can be used to further set the stage for the rest of the story.
